price: 102.Ismaaqil yembeeh barak abballuk taamáh edde gexa caddo yoofe waqdi, yi-baxaw diggah anu soonol koo asguudem ublek, a-caagid wagitey maca kot ceela? Kaak iyye. Yi-babbaw elle amrisimtem ab, wohul Yalli faxek yisbire marih numuh yoo geettok kaak iyye.
arabic: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعۡيَ قَالَ يَٰبُنَيَّ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡمَنَامِ أَنِّيٓ أَذۡبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرۡ مَاذَا تَرَىٰۚ قَالَ يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفۡعَلۡ مَا تُؤۡمَرُۖ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā balagha maʿahu al-saʿya qāla yābunayya innī arā fī al-manāmi annī adhbaḥuka fa-unẓur mādhā tarā qāla yāabati if'ʿal mā tu'maru satajidunī in shāa al-lahu mina al-ṣābirīna
